dct_title_s: Mexico and Central America to illustrate Harper's Gazetteer
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures. Depths shown by soundings. Shows sailing routes through the West Indies, indicated by passage, major cities and ports; lower Mexico, Northwest coast of South America, Texas as part of United States; layouts of cities in port insets; parishes, towns and estates for inset of Jamaica; "Gr. Bahama Banx" spelled with an "x." Includes key to "Abreviations of the Names of the Nations possessing the West India Is." and notes. "Transferred and Printed for J.C. Smith & Son by D. McLellan." From: Harpers Statistical Gazetteer of the World, 1855. Insets: The harbour and city of Havana -- Jamaica -- The harbours of Port Royal & Kingston.
